title: 859 W. Fletcher St Unit CH
posting_body: This wonderful Victorian building is tucked away on a quiet tree lined street, yet is in the very heart of Lakeview, steps from Halsted and Clark Streets.
Belmont Avenue, which is just a block north, has a number of local boutiques and charming restaurants as well as the CTA El stop with connections to the Red, Brown, and Purple Express Lines.
Surrounding major streets also have a variety of dining and entertainment options including several theaters.
Lake Shore Drive and Chicago’s lakefront are located two blocks east.
This provides easy commuter transportation as well as a number of outdoor activities including biking, running, golf, and lounging on the beach.
The #22 Clark street bus stop is less than a block away and offers a quick route to downtown all night long.
We offer a hassle-free full online leasing process featuring online applications, lease signing, and payment options.
Advertised rent prices are subject to change without notice!
